t: Can another seller use my pictures on a similar listing?
s: When I add my listing, I can add additional photos of my product and a description of condition, but a buyer only sees these when they click on my listing from the available offers. The only time this process changes is when the product you have is your own brand, in which case you register that brand to protect against unscrupulous sellers trying to sell a similar ...

t: Visual Search

t: Why do some products on Amazon look the same but have different brand names? - Quora
s: Answer: This is simple to answer. They look similar because the different brands are using the same supplier.
